metaTags.metaDescription: Simpler more flexible architecture, trusted secure connectivity, and faster future-proof innovation. Learn why customers choose Cloudflare over Zscaler.

relatedBlades.title: Comparing Cloudflare vs. Zscaler
relatedBlades.subtitle: Which better fuels transformation?
relatedBlades.copy:
Don't lock yourself out of your own future. Cloudflare helps you move quickly and nimbly as the future of networking evolves.

Simple deployment, network resiliency, and quick innovation provide a stronger foundation for true transformation of networking, security, and applications.

imageAssetFile.title: Zscaler vs Cloudflare hero image: transformation

relatedBlades.title: Three reasons customers choose Cloudflare over Zscaler

features.title: Simpler, more flexible architecture
features.description: Cloudflare customers value a uniform and composable platform for easy setup and operations. They do not want piecemeal services that lead to a more time-consuming, error-prone experience.

features.title: Trusted, secure connectivity
features.description: The Cloudflare global network is built with end-to-end traffic automation for reliability and performance that customers trust. No one wants manual connectivity to many cloud networks that forces security tradeoffs.

features.title: Faster, future-proof innovation
features.description: Cloudflare is architected to integrate innovations into the same network that customers use to evolve fast. No one wants new services bolted on or stagnating adoption of new standards that delays their future.

relatedBlades.mainHeadline: Pick an architecture designed for the future of networking

content.value: When choosing Cloudflare over Zscaler, you will benefit from a network built to run every edge service on every server — globally. We bring the entire network to the cloud and enable

with single-pass inspection, quickly connecting users, devices, workloads, offices, clouds, data centers, and resources, wherever they are located. It is easy to deploy and run, so you can take control and start modernizing your environment at your desired pace, without needing an infinite IT budget, a parade of expensive POCs, and multiple complex deployments to get there.

related_asset.title: [Beat Zscaler] Architecture comparison [1128PX W x 438PX H]

relatedBlades.title: Fast-track your journey to secure, any-to-any connectivity
relatedBlades.copy:
While Zero Trust principles remain the same across providers, implementation and ROI vary widely. Cloudflare uniformly connects and secures end-to-end using one network and control plane to provide a better experience for both your IT practitioners and end users.

- Who would pick siloed services as a first choice? No one. That is why *all* Cloudflare on-ramps and edge services actually work together.
- Don't wait weeks on white-glove support to start adoption. Our services platform is composable, so in just minutes and hours you are solving real use cases.
- Avoid bloated virtual machine deployment logistics. Speed setup time with software-only connectors and one-time integrations.

togglesTo.title: Fast-track your journey to secure, any-to-any connectivity
togglesTo.copy:
While Zero Trust principles remain the same across providers, implementation and ROI vary widely. Cloudflare uniformly connects and secures end-to-end using one network and control plane to provide a better experience for both your IT practitioners and end users.

- Who would pick siloed services as a first choice? No one. That is why *all* Cloudflare on-ramps and edge services actually work together.
- Don't wait weeks on white-glove support to start adoption. Our services platform is composable, so in just minutes and hours you are solving real use cases.
- Avoid bloated virtual machine deployment logistics. Speed setup time with software-only connectors and one-time integrations.

relatedBlades.title: Only a better Internet can consistently protect your business
relatedBlades.copy:
Today, roughly 20% of all websites are routed through the Cloudflare network — using the same proxies that deliver Zero Trust for your business. Our end-to-end traffic automation ensures reliable and scalable network connectivity with consistent protection from any location.

- Security should not feel like a puzzle. Every edge service is built to run in every network location, available to every customer.
- We feature a 100% uptime SLA for paid plans that only an Anycast architecture can deliver. Other vendors cannot just add this to their platform later. 
- Direct private interconnects keep your traffic away from the public Internet. This should be non-negotiable, but Zscaler does not offer it.

imageAssetFile.title: Only a better Internet: Cloudflare, Resilient

togglesTo.title: Only a better Internet can consistently protect your business

imageAssetFile.title: Only a better Internet: Zscaler, Vulnerable

relatedBlades.title: Relentlessly stay ahead of modern business needs to secure your future
relatedBlades.copy:
Our future-proof architecture helps us build and ship very quickly — something we have established a solid reputation around. Check out our blog for proof! Pick a customer-led, agile provider with a lightning-fast rate of change to innovate new networking, security, and application capabilities.

- We have one composable, developer-friendly cloud platform — not multiple fragmented clouds — that is extensible with any future edge service.
- We achieve rapid, native adoption of new Internet and security standards.
- Our history of technical prowess and growth speaks for itself, and our foundation provides extreme optionality.
relatedBlades.subheadline: Is the pace of innovation fast enough?

features.title: Comparison Brief: Cloudflare vs. Zscaler
features.description:
Share with your teams the details on how Cloudflare stacks up. 

Which better fuels transformation?

imageAssetFile.title: Zscaler vs Cloudflare hero image: transformation

features.title: PDF: Cloudflare vs. Zscaler Deep Dive
features.description: 37 comparison criteria are organized into five groups: Internet-native network platform, cloud-native service platform, services to adopt a SASE architecture, services to extend Zero Trust, SSE, SASE, and beyond (the current definitions of these market trends), and network on-ramps.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Cloudflare's Network is Faster than Zscaler
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Cloudflare's Network is Faster than Zscaler

features.title: PDF: Cloudflare Zero Trust
features.description: Cloudflare Zero Trust is a security platform that increases visibility, eliminates complexity, and reduces risks as remote and office users connect to applications and the Internet. In a single-pass architecture, traffic is verified, filtered, inspected, and isolated from threats.

features.title: PDF: Cloudflare One
features.description: Cloudflare's SASE platform, Cloudflare One, is a Zero Trust network-as-a-service built on a single, unified Internet-native network platform. It places identity-based security controls, firewall, WAN-as-a-Service and more close to users everywhere on Earth, helping them quickly and securely connect to any enterprise resource.

relatedBlades.title: Why wait and pay to try Zscaler when you can start our free plan in minutes?
